About Me

ü§ñ What I do?

I work on AI-focused personal projects, specializing in voice synthesis and text generation. I'm familiar with Python, Java, C++, and C#, and I aim to apply my skills to innovative and impactful software development projects.

üìö Ongoing Learning

  • Current Course: Bachelor in Science Specializing in Computer Science at CIIT: College of Arts and Technology.
  • Personal Project: Developing a joint-project mobile application utilizing React and TypeScript called MobileLLaMA. I am also learning more about Machine Learning.
  • Tech Reading/Research: Regularly researching current Python-related libraries and strategies for different approaches to Machine Learning.

üõ†Ô∏è Expertise

  • Programming Languages: Familiar with Python, Java, C++, and C#‚Äîused for various AI and software development projects.
  • Frameworks & Libraries: Experienced in PyTorch, Flask, and RVC for AI, web development, and real-time voice processing tasks.
  • Collaborative Tools: Knowledge in GitHub, Jira, and Trello for version control, project management, and team collaboration.
  • Other Skills: Proficient in back-end programming, AI development, and applying innovative solutions to software challenges.

üí° Skills // beyond the code

  • Leadership: Guiding teams toward shared goals by fostering collaboration, accountability, and effective decision-making.
  • Adaptability: Quickly adjusting to new challenges, environments, or technologies while maintaining focus on outcomes.
  • Creativity: Generating innovative solutions and approaches to complex problems through imagination and diverse perspectives.
  • Critical Thinking: Analyzing problems logically and systematically to develop well-founded solutions and informed decisions.
); }; export default About;
